name: Duck Hunt (o_vermei)
description:
Duck Hunt is a small platformer game where you are an overweight duck unable to fly.

He spent the whole year just drinking, eating and sleeping at home. Help him get to south before the winter comes.

Controls: WASD

P.S: in the WebGL version, use full screen (you won't be able to see some platforms otherwise)

This is my second game made in 9 days for Untitled Game Jam #37 - theme: ducks.
